TypeTeamMember.biography: As the VP of Solutions Engineering, Jaison oversees a global group of consultants and technologists that owns TripleLift's marketplace, strategic partner initiatives, and forward-deployed data science and engineering efforts. Prior to joining TripleLift, Jaison worked in corporate development at AOL and investment banking at J.P. Morgan. Jaison started his career developing autonomous vehicle technology at Princeton University where he graduated with distinction from the ORFE and CS departments.
